SimplePairedTwoTrack.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004 
00005   SimplePairedTwoTrack.h
00006 
00007   Vincent A. Busam
00008   Dominic Mazzoni
00009 
00010   This abstract class simplifies the implementation of a basic
00011   two track effect where you want the values of both tracks
00012   together.  Inherit from it if your effect doesn't just
00013   modifies a track in place and doesn't care how many samples
00014   it gets at a time.  Your derived class only needs to implement
00015   GetEffectName, GetEffectAction, and ProcessSimplePairedTwoTrack.
00016 
00017 **********************************************************************/
00018 
00019 #ifndef __AUDACITY_EFFECT_SIMPLE_PAIRED_TWO_TRACK__
00020 #define __AUDACITY_EFFECT_SIMPLE_PAIRED_TWO_TRACK__
00021 
00022 #include "Effect.h"
00023 
00024 class WaveTrack;
00025 
00026 // The only purpose for EffectSimplePairedTwoTrackBase is to provide virtual function
00027 //    that EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack and its derived classes can use.  I couldn't
00028 //    figure out how to do it otherwise.
00029 // The unfortunate side effect of this base class is that it doesn't know the data types!
00030 
00031 class EffectSimplePairedTwoTrackBase : public Effect
00032 {
00033 public:
00034    virtual ~EffectSimplePairedTwoTrackBase() {};
00035 
00036     // Override this method to actually process audio
00037     virtual bool ProcessSimplePairedTwoTrack(/*_DataType*/void *bufferLeft, 
00038                                   /*_DataType*/void *bufferRight, // may be 0
00039                                   sampleCount len)
00040                      { return false; };
00041 };
00042 
00043 // This class is a template.  We can do:
00044 
00045 // typedef EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack<short int,int16Sample> EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack
00046 
00047 //  and similarly for other types.
00048 
00049 template<class _DataType,sampleFormat _xxxSample>
00050 class EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack:public EffectSimplePairedTwoTrackBase 
00051 {
00052 
00053 public:
00054    // It is not usually necessary to override this method
00055    virtual bool Process();
00056 
00057    // It is necessary to provide an implementation for ProcessSimplePairedTwoTrack.
00058 
00059 protected:
00060    // It is not usually necessary to override this method
00061    virtual bool Init();
00062 
00063    // It is not usually necessary to override this method
00064    virtual bool ProcessTwo( int count, WaveTrack *left, WaveTrack *right,
00065                      sampleCount lstart,
00066                      sampleCount rstart, sampleCount len);
00067 
00068    // It is not usually necessary to override this method
00069    void GetSamples(WaveTrack *track, 
00070                   sampleCount *start,
00071                sampleCount *len);
00072 
00073    // It is not usually necessary to override this method
00074    void End();
00075 
00076  protected:  
00077 
00078    // Other useful information
00079 
00080    sampleCount mnBlockSize;   // 0 if no processing done, thus no buffers allocated
00081 
00082    _DataType *mLeftBuffer;
00083    _DataType *mRightBuffer;
00084 
00085    int mnTracks;        // either 1 or 2, set in Init
00086 };
00087 
00088 /**********************************************************************
00089 **********************************************************************/
00090 
00091 #include <math.h>
00092 
00093 #include <wx/defs.h>
00094 #include <wx/msgdlg.h>
00095 
00096 #include "../WaveTrack.h"     /*WAVETRACK*/
00097 
00098 template<class _DataType,sampleFormat _xxxSample>
00099 bool EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack<_DataType,_xxxSample>::Init()
00100 {
00101    mnTracks = 1;
00102    mnBlockSize = 0;
00103 
00104    TrackListIterator iter(mTracks);
00105    WaveTrack *left = (WaveTrack*)(iter.First());
00106    if ( left == 0 )
00107      return false;      // we need an existing track
00108 
00109    while(left) {
00110        sampleCount lstart, rstart;
00111        sampleCount llen, rlen;
00112        GetSamples((WaveTrack *)left, &lstart, &llen);
00113      
00114        if (left->GetLinked()) {
00115        mnTracks = 2;
00116          WaveTrack *right = (WaveTrack*)(iter.Next());
00117          GetSamples((WaveTrack *)right, &rstart, &rlen);
00118         
00119          if (llen != rlen || ((WaveTrack *)left)->GetRate() != ((WaveTrack *)right)->GetRate()) {
00120             wxMessageBox(_("Sorry, this effect cannot be performed on stereo tracks where the individual channels of the track do not match."));
00121             return false;
00122        }
00123       }
00124      
00125       left = (WaveTrack*)(iter.Next());
00126    }
00127 
00128    return true;
00129 }
00130 
00131 template<class _DataType,sampleFormat _xxxSample>
00132 bool EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack<_DataType,_xxxSample>::Process()
00133 {
00134    this->CopyInputWaveTracks(); // Set up mOutputWaveTracks.
00135    bool bGoodResult = true;
00136 
00137    TrackListIterator iter(mOutputWaveTracks);
00138    int count = 0;
00139    WaveTrack *left = (WaveTrack*)(iter.First());
00140    WaveTrack *right;
00141    while(left) {
00142       sampleCount lstart, rstart;
00143       sampleCount len;
00144       GetSamples((WaveTrack *)left, &lstart, &len);
00145 
00146       right = NULL;
00147       if (left->GetLinked()) {
00148          right = (WaveTrack*)(iter.Next());         
00149          GetSamples((WaveTrack *)right, &rstart, &len);
00150       }
00151 
00152       bGoodResult = ProcessTwo(count,
00153                                  (WaveTrack *)left, 
00154                                  (WaveTrack *)right,
00155                                  lstart, 
00156                                  rstart, 
00157                                  len );
00158       if (!bGoodResult)
00159          break;
00160    
00161       left = (WaveTrack*)(iter.Next());
00162       count++;
00163    }
00164    
00165    this->ReplaceProcessedWaveTracks(bGoodResult); 
00166    return bGoodResult;
00167 }
00168 
00169 template<class _DataType,sampleFormat _xxxSample>
00170 bool EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack<_DataType,_xxxSample>::ProcessTwo(int count, 
00171                                                       WaveTrack *left, 
00172                                                       WaveTrack *right,
00173                                                       sampleCount lstart,
00174                                                       sampleCount rstart, 
00175                                                       sampleCount len)
00176 {
00177    if (mnBlockSize == 0) {
00178       mnBlockSize = left->GetMaxBlockSize();
00179 
00180       mLeftBuffer  = new _DataType[mnBlockSize];
00181      if ( mnTracks > 1 )
00182         mRightBuffer = new _DataType[mnBlockSize];
00183      else
00184         mRightBuffer = 0;
00185    }
00186 
00187    // Get both buffers here
00188 
00189    sampleCount originalLen = len;
00190    sampleCount ls = lstart;
00191    sampleCount rs = rstart;
00192    while (len) {
00193       int block = mnBlockSize;
00194       if (block > len)
00195          block = len;
00196 
00197       left->Get((samplePtr)mLeftBuffer, _xxxSample, ls, block);
00198       if (right) {
00199          right->Get((samplePtr)mRightBuffer, _xxxSample, rs, block);
00200       }
00201 
00202      // The derived class process the tracks here
00203       ProcessSimplePairedTwoTrack(mLeftBuffer, mRightBuffer, block);
00204 
00205       left->Set((samplePtr)mLeftBuffer, _xxxSample, ls, block);
00206       
00207       if (right) {
00208          right->Set((samplePtr)mRightBuffer, _xxxSample, rs, block);
00209       }      
00210 
00211       len -= block;
00212       ls += block;
00213       rs += block;
00214       
00215       if (mnTracks > 1) {      
00216          if (TrackGroupProgress(count, (ls-lstart)/(double)originalLen))
00217             break;
00218       }
00219       else {
00220          if (TrackProgress(count, (ls-lstart)/(double)originalLen))
00221             break;
00222       }
00223    }
00224 
00225    return true;
00226 }
00227 
00228 template<class _DataType,sampleFormat _xxxSample>
00229 void EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack<_DataType,_xxxSample>::GetSamples(WaveTrack *track,
00230                                        sampleCount *start,
00231                                        sampleCount *len)
00232 {
00233    double trackStart = track->GetStartTime();
00234    double trackEnd = track->GetEndTime();
00235    double t0 = mT0 < trackStart? trackStart: mT0;
00236    double t1 = mT1 > trackEnd? trackEnd: mT1;
00237    
00238    if (t1 > t0) {
00239       *start = track->TimeToLongSamples(t0);
00240       sampleCount end = track->TimeToLongSamples(t1);
00241       *len = (sampleCount)(end - *start);
00242    }
00243    else {
00244       *start = 0;
00245       *len  = 0;
00246    }
00247 }
00248 
00249 template<class _DataType,sampleFormat _xxxSample>
00250 void EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack<_DataType,_xxxSample>::End()
00251 {
00252    if (mnBlockSize) {
00253       delete[]mLeftBuffer;
00254       delete[]mRightBuffer;
00255 
00256    }
00257    mLeftBuffer = NULL;
00258    mRightBuffer = NULL;
00259 }
